Scenario Fair Shares

Source: vignettes/scenario-fair-shares.Rmd
scenario-fair-shares.Rmd
library(r2dii.dataraw)
#> Loading required package: r2dii.utils
library(r2dii.analysis)

Scenario Fair Shares

Scenario efforts must be allocated to the portfolio’s production profile. To do this, two principals are currently implemented:

  1. Technology Fair Share:

\[p_{i}^{tfsr}(t) = p_{i}(t_0) * \dfrac{s_i(t)}{s_i(t_0)}\]

where:

  • \(s_i(t)\) is the scenario production for technology \(i\) at time \(t\),
  • \(p_{i,j}(t_0)\) is the production allocated to the portfolio for some technology, \(i\) at time \(t_0\), and
  • \(p_{i,j}^{tfsr}(t)\) is the portfolio-specific target production for that technology.

We define the “Technology Fair Share Ratio” as:

\[\dfrac{s_i(t)}{s_i(t_0)}\]

  1. Market Fair Share:

\[p_{i,j}^{mfsp}(t) = p_{i,j}(t_0) +P_i(t_0) * \left( \dfrac{s_j(t)-s_j(t_0)}{S(t_0)}\right)\] where:

  • \(P_i(t_0)\) is the portfolio’s total production in the sector at \(t_0\), and
  • \(S(t_0)\) is the scenario total production at \(t_0\).

We define the “Market Fair Share Percentage” as:

\[\dfrac{s_j(t)-s_j(t_0)}{S(t_0)}\]

Calculation

These fair shares can be calculated for an arbitrary scenario using:

add_fair_share_columns(scenario_demo, start_year = 2020)
#> # A tibble: 1,323 x 9
#>    scenario sector     technology region  year  value units         tfsr    mfsp
#>    <chr>    <chr>      <chr>      <chr>  <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>        <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1 cps      automotive electric   global  2020  0.836 cars produc…  1    0      
#>  2 cps      automotive hybrid     global  2020 12.8   cars produc…  1    0      
#>  3 cps      automotive ice        global  2020 79.9   cars produc…  1    0      
#>  4 cps      automotive electric   global  2021  0.937 cars produc…  1.12 0.00108
#>  5 cps      automotive hybrid     global  2021 14.3   cars produc…  1.12 0.0165 
#>  6 cps      automotive ice        global  2021 81.7   cars produc…  1.02 0.0188 
#>  7 cps      automotive electric   global  2022  1.04  cars produc…  1.24 0.00213
#>  8 cps      automotive hybrid     global  2022 15.8   cars produc…  1.24 0.0326 
#>  9 cps      automotive ice        global  2022 83.4   cars produc…  1.04 0.0378 
#> 10 cps      automotive electric   global  2023  1.13  cars produc…  1.35 0.00316
